title: Emma Stone and Andrew Garfield seen together after BAFTAs | Daily Mail Online
text: 'They looked very animated and happy to be together.' MailOnline has contacted both stars' representatives, and a spokesperson for Emma declined to comment. A source told The Sun: 'As soon as Andrew finished his meal he made a beeline for her and gave her a huge hug. They chatted and laughed for at least half an hour' This comes after the 28-year-old La La Land star and the 33-year-old Spider-Man actor were seen reuniting at the BAFTA Nespresso Nominees' Party held at Kensington Palace on Saturday night. The pair shared a friendly hug as they chatted inside the bash, but their connection appeared to be friendly rather than romantic. The stars became an item after meeting on set of The Amazing Spider-Man in 2011, before finally splitting in December 2015. Fancy seeing you here! 'Emma Stone. I love Emma,' he told The Hollywood Reporter when asked who he would bring to a desert island. 'She’s all right. She can come.' And it appeared the feeling was mutual as weeks earlier Emma admitted in a Vogue interview that she still missed her former flame. Speaking about the year following their split, she admitted he was 'someone I still love very much', adding: 'It's been interesting. It's been a good year. And sad. Pros and cons.'
